overview_of_class: We will peruse the literature of research, philosophy and practice regarding creative thinking in music. We will also look at general theories of creative thinking as they overlap with research in music. The over-arching theme will be to consider how these theories and writings can be applied in music teaching and learning. Students will be encouraged to create final projects that they will be able to apply in their own teaching situations (in any setting or level).
name: Creative Thinking in  Music
